fileVersion.title: The version number of the configuration file format.

version.title: The semantic version of the language module.

friendlyName.title: A user-friendly name for the language module.

description.title: A brief description or overview of the language module.

createdBy.title: The creator or author of the language module.

createdByURL.title: The URL linking to the creator's profile or information.

docsURL.title: The URL linking to the documentation for the language module.

downloadURL.title: The URL for downloading the language module, typically a release package or ZIP file.

updateURL.title: The URL for checking and fetching updates for the language module.

supportedPlatforms.title: An array listing the platforms supported by the language module.

resourceDirectories.title: Specifies additional directories where the language module can search for resources.

language.title: The identifier for the programming language supported by the module.

libraryDirectories.title: Specifies additional directories where the language module can search for libraries.

forceLoad.title: Indicates whether the language module should be force-loaded by the Plugify core.
